entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
